firmware.description: 1) Fixed display issue in Nixx charge termination setting.\r\n 2) Changed balancing behavior during discharge - balancing now starts below Balance Start V.
1) Fixed display bugs.\r\n 2) Changed fan operation to temperature controlled.\r\n 3) Added parallel charge/discharge option.

1) Added Ioniq Mode for LiPos.
 2) Added parallel mode option for LiHV.
 3) Fixed change amp bugs (parallel mode) in Li Unbalanced Charge and Regenerative Discharge.
 4) Changed Battery Status and Cell IR Info to display single pack status in parallel mode.
 5) When error occurs, pressing Back goes to status info screen instead of main screen.
 6) Added 14.4V - 24.0V range in Regen V. Max setting.
 7) Increased supply noise filtering when charging at low currents.
 8) Changed supply high error message to appear at 31V instead of 30V.
1) Fixed termination amps issue during parallel charge.
